ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hot Key to Re-target Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: so apparently on the pvp servers you can re-charm before it wears off, is that right?  and wasn t there mention by verant of moving this to the other servers?
ygData.messageBody:
so apparently on the pvp servers you can re-charm before it wears off, is
that right? and wasn't there mention by verant of moving this to the other
servers? that would make charming a lot easier and safer. although i
prefer charming the more powerful mob in any given situation to have the
best pet, it is often worse seeing the damage i often take since i have to
wait for charm to break before i can re-cast it. sure when you do it enough
you can get the timing down pretty close, but you are just as often just
slightly early or late. then you get a krup knight beating and bashing the
crap out of you while you try to re-charm. would be nice if this was
changed. just a thought.

Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> It seems to me to be pretty rare when charm breaks early, if
> it does I hit
> esc to clear my target and inevitably the one I charm is
> beating on me, so
> he will soon be targeted again.
>
> I could retarget my pet right away, but then I am not dealing
> any melee
> damage.
